com.libmailcore

Class IMAPMessagesRequestKind

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.libmailcore.IMAPMessagesRequestKind

  • public class IMAPMessagesRequestKind
extends java.lang.Object
    Items to request when fetching the list of messages.
    See Also:
    IMAPSession.fetchMessagesByUIDOperation(String folder, int requestKind, IndexSet indexes), IMAPSession.fetchMessagesByNumberOperation(String folder, int requestKind, IndexSet indexes), IMAPSession.syncMessagesByUIDOperation(String folder, int requestKind, IndexSet indexes, long modSeq)

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int IMAPMessagesRequestKindExtraHeaders
      Requests extra headers.
      static int IMAPMessagesRequestKindFlags
      Requests the flags of the messages.
      static int IMAPMessagesRequestKindFullHeaders
      Requests the headers of the messages.
      static int IMAPMessagesRequestKindGmailLabels
      Requests the Labels on Gmail server.

      Requests the message identifier on Gmail server.
      static int IMAPMessagesRequestKindGmailThreadID
      Requests the message thread identifier on Gmail server.
      static int IMAPMessagesRequestKindHeaders
      Requests the headers of the messages (ENVELOPE).
      static int IMAPMessagesRequestKindHeaderSubject
      Requests the header "Subject".
      static int IMAPMessagesRequestKindInternalDate
      Requests the received date of the messages (INTERNALDATE).
      static int IMAPMessagesRequestKindSize
      Requests the size of the messages.
      static int IMAPMessagesRequestKindStructure
      Requests the MIME Structure of the messages (BODYSTRUCTURE).
      static int IMAPMessagesRequestKindUid
      Requests UID of the messages.
